conditions.name: Blinded
effects: Can't see and automatically fails any ability check that requires sight
Attack rolls against the creature have advantage
The creature's attack rolls have disadvantage

conditions.name: Charmed
effects: Can't attack the charmer or target them with harmful abilities or magical effects
The charmer has advantage on social interaction checks with the creature

conditions.name: Deafened
effects: Can't hear and automatically fails any ability check that requires hearing

conditions.name: Frightened
effects: Has disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls while the source of fear is in line of sight
Can't willingly move closer to the source of fear

conditions.name: Grappled
effects: Speed becomes 0 and can't benefit from any bonus to speed
Ends if the grappler is incapacitated or moved out of reach

conditions.name: Incapacitated
effects: Can't take actions or reactions

conditions.name: Invisible
effects: Impossible to see without magic or special sense
Attack rolls against the creature have disadvantage
The creature's attack rolls have advantage

conditions.name: Paralyzed
effects: Is incapacitated and can't move or speak
Automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws
Attack rolls against the creature have advantage
Any attack that hits is a critical hit if the attacker is within 5 feet

conditions.name: Petrified
effects: Transformed into a solid inanimate substance
Is incapacitated, can't move or speak, unaware of surroundings
Attack rolls against the creature have advantage
Automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws
Resistance to all damage, immune to poison and disease

conditions.name: Poisoned
effects: Has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks

conditions.name: Prone
effects: Can only crawl (every foot costs 1 extra foot)
Has disadvantage on attack rolls
Attack rolls have advantage if attacker within 5 feet, otherwise disadvantage

conditions.name: Restrained
effects: Speed becomes 0
Attack rolls against the creature have advantage
The creature's attack rolls have disadvantage
Has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws

conditions.name: Stunned
effects: Is incapacitated, can't move, can only speak falteringly
Automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws
Attack rolls against the creature have advantage

conditions.name: Unconscious
effects: Is incapacitated, can't move or speak, unaware of surroundings
Drops whatever it's holding and falls prone
Automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws
Attack rolls against the creature have advantage
Any attack that hits is a critical hit if the attacker is within 5 feet
